dialog_1.name: Ice Kachang Man
dialog_1.text: Ice Kachang! Ice Kachang! Come get your Ice Kachang!

dialog_2.name: Ice Kachang Man
dialog_2.text: Would you like to buy one?

dialog_3.name: Ice Kachang Man
dialog_3.text: Solid! One delicious Ice Kachange coming right up

instru_1.text: Obtained the item Ice Kachang from Ice Kachang Man

dialog_5.name: Ice Kachang Man
dialog_5.text: Thank you very much! Hope to see you again!
